name: efcms-service
description: US Tax Court Document Service API

scripts.install:dynamodb: ./node_modules/.bin/sls dynamodb install -s local -r us-east-1 --domain noop --accountId noop --documentsTableName efcms-documents-local --casesTableName efcms-cases-local
scripts.start:local: SLS_DEPLOYMENT_BUCKET=noop ./node_modules/.bin/sls offline start --noTimeout --stage local --region us-east-1 --domain noop  --documentsTableName efcms-documents-local --casesTableName efcms-cases-local --accountId noop
scripts.start: $(sleep 5; npm run create-tables) & npm run start:local
scripts.truffleHog: if [ $(trufflehog --regex --entropy=True https://github.com/flexion/ustc-case-mgmt.git | grep 'Filepath:' | grep -v 'package-lock.json' | wc -l) -ne '0' ]; then echo 'WARNING! A secret key was found in the git repo!'; exit 1; fi
scripts.docker:shellcheck: docker build -t efcms-build -f ../Dockerfile.build .. && docker run --rm efcms-build /bin/sh -c 'cd efcms-service && ./run-shellcheck.sh'
scripts.docker:audit: docker build -t efcms-build -f ../Dockerfile.build .. && docker run --rm efcms-build /bin/sh -c 'cd efcms-service && npm audit'
scripts.docker:lint: docker build -t efcms-build -f ../Dockerfile.build .. && docker run --rm efcms-build /bin/sh -c 'cd efcms-service && npm run lint'
scripts.docker:test: docker build -t efcms-build -f ../Dockerfile.build .. && docker run --name $CONTAINER_NAME efcms-build /bin/sh -c 'cd efcms-service && npm run test' && docker cp $CONTAINER_NAME:/home/app/efcms-service/coverage coverage && docker rm $CONTAINER_NAME
scripts.docker:sonarqube: docker build -t api-sonarqube -f Dockerfile.sonarqube . && docker run -e SONAR_KEY=$API_SONAR_KEY -e branch_name=$branch_name -e SONAR_ORG=$SONAR_ORG -e SONAR_TOKEN=$SONAR_TOKEN -v `pwd`/coverage:/home/app/coverage --rm api-sonarqube
scripts.docker:terraform: docker build -t efcms-build -f ../Dockerfile.build .. && docker run -e ENV=$ENV -e EFCMS_DOMAIN=$EFCMS_DOMAIN --rm efcms-build /bin/sh -c 'cd efcms-service/terraform/main && ../bin/deploy-app.sh $ENV'
